## FeedManager.createFeedFromUrl() method

Create an RSS feed Markdown representation from a hyperlink.

The Markdown representation consists of - a feed dashboard - a directory whic has the same name as the dashboard (without the .md extension) containingthe RSS items of the feed,

The file system layout of an Obsidian RSS feed looks like this: \~\~\~ 📂 ├─ <feedname>.md ← dashboard ╰─ 📂<feedname> ├─ <item-1>.md ├─ … ╰─ <item-n>.md \~\~\~

**Signature:**

```typescript
createFeedFromUrl(url: string): Promise<RSSfeedAdapter>;
```

</td><td>
